# calcite-dropdown



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                        | Type                                      | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `appearance`    | `appearance`     | specify the appearance, defaults to default        | `"default" \| "minimal"`                  | `"default"` |
| `iconPosition`  | `icon-position`  | specify the placement of the icon, defaults to end | `"end" \| "start"`                        | `"end"`     |
| `scale`         | `scale`          | specify the scale of dropdrown, defaults to m      | `"l" \| "m" \| "s"`                       | `"m"`       |
| `selectionMode` | `selection-mode` | specify the selection mode - defaults to multi     | `"multi" \| "single" \| "single-persist"` | `"multi"`   |
| `theme`         | `theme`          | specify the theme of dropdrown, defaults to light  | `"dark" \| "light"`                       | `"light"`   |


## Events

| Event                            | Description | Type               |
| -------------------------------- | ----------- | ------------------ |
| `calciteAccordionItemHasChanged` |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |
